ingredients.ingredient: 8 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate, coarsely chopped

cookingTips: Prepare brownie batter according to package directions and spread in prepared pan
Layer graham crackers on the batter, then marshmallows, then chocolate before baking
Add toppings partway through baking so marshmallows toast and chocolate melts without burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dessert transforms the classic s'more into a baked treat. Guide the cook on timing the addition of toppings to achieve melted, toasted textures without overcooking.
